end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Relax, You’re Among Friends.
Unwind and Belong. Your Gulf Harbour Family is Ready to Welcome You.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Find Your Place Here
Finding the right place to settle down is a big decision as you consider relocating or retiring. The community you choose, the region, the activities, the amenities and the people you’ll get to know at your new club are all major factors in your decision. At Gulf Harbour, we are a warm, welcoming and inviting community dedicated to helping new members and their families find their place here.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Imagine Yourself
Unwinding amidst inviting landscapes and stunning sunsets.
Connecting with neighbors who share your passions.
Indulging in world-class amenities, from a championship golf course to a new tennis complex, fitness center and luxurious spa treatments.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Discover the Gulf Harbour Difference
We invite you to browse the links below to learn more about our exceptional offerings and how your membership will foster a sense of belonging that becomes family.
Contact Membership and Communications Director, Holly Trent,
(239) 444-3631
or
htrent@gulfharbour.com
.
end widget-span

end row-wrapper

end row
end row-wrapper
Take the Next Step and Become Part of Our Family.
Gulf Harbour Looks Forward to Welcoming You.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Find the place where you belong at Gulf Harbour, Southwest Florida's premier private community.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Three Ways to Get Started at
Gulf Harbour Yacht & Country Club
Inquire About Membership →
Inquire About a Tour →
Explore Membership Offerings and Pricing →
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Build Lasting Friendships And Reconnect With Yourself.
Our two membership categories, both golf and sports, offer something for everyone. Either option includes access for spouses or companions and unmarried children (up to age 23).
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Golf Membership
Enjoy year-round golf, along with unlimited access to our driving range and practice facilities. As a member, you can participate in a variety of events and tournaments, and conveniently book tee times up to seven days in advance. Take advantage of our local club Reciprocal Program for added golfing opportunities to play other neighboring clubs. Beyond the links, members can indulge in social activities, waterfront dining and full access to our state-of-the-art Wellness Center, featuring a heated pool, saunas, steam rooms and a luxurious Day Spa. Our comprehensive tennis program offers another avenue for fitness and fun.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Sports Membership
Enjoy a vibrant lifestyle at Gulf Harbour with a Sports Membership. Take advantage of diverse and delicious dining options, including the fun and casual Waterside Grille. Participate in a full calendar of social events and activities. Our Wellness Center offers a range of amenities, from a heated pool to saunas, steam rooms, fitness classes and a full spa. Stay active with our inclusive tennis program. Gulf Harbour has the most active tennis program in Southwest Florida. And enjoy golf privileges from May through October.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
When You’re Ready,
We’re Here.
Contact
Holly Trent, Membership Director
, or complete
form below
, to learn more and schedule a personalized tour. And be sure to ask about our Ambassador Program and how it can make your introduction to Gulf Harbour informative and fun.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Interested in learning more about a membership at the top private club in Fort Myers.
Please fill out the form below or contact Holly Trent, Membership and Communications Director,
(239) 444-3631,
or
htrent@gulfharbour.com
.

Contact Gulf Harbour Today.

A private member-owned country club community along Southwest Florida’s most stunning backdrop.
Gulf Harbour is just minutes away from downtown Fort Myers, Sanibel and Captiva Island.

end row
end row-wrapper
Fresh, Local and Unmistakably Satisfying
The Flavors of the Gulf Bring Friends Together.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Dining At Gulf Harbour:
Where Culinary Memories Are On The Menu
Food brings us all together. At Gulf Harbour, our restaurants offer deliciously-crafted meals by our Certified Executive Chef, showcasing his talents in a variety of venues. Celebrate life's milestones, explore new culinary delights, or simply catch up with friends over classic and casual dishes with a refreshing flair.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Kick Back:
Waterside Grille
Come as you are and dine with friends. Casual and comfortable, this open-air, poolside spot overlooking the marina, is everyone’s favorite for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The perfect place to catch up and unwind all day long.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Kick Back:
Waterside Grille
Come as you are and dine with friends. Casual and comfortable, this open-air, poolside spot overlooking the marina, is everyone’s favorite for breakfast, lunch and dinner. The perfect place to catch up and unwind all day long.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Relax and Chill:
Johnny Brown's
Escape the heat while you still enjoy the view. Johnny Brown's features air-conditioned dining with mouthwatering plates for lunch and dinner. Gather with friends for new twists on juicy burgers, fresh local seafood or something more adventurous on the menu. Weekly specials and the popular Sunday breakfast buffet keep the options inspired—with something for every palette. Johnny Brown’s offers a scenic view of the marina as well as the perfect vantage point to take in spectacular Southwest Florida sunsets.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Relax and Chill:
Johnny Brown's

end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Embracing Elegance:
Harbourview Room
For a special occasion or an intimate gathering, step into the Harbourview Room. This elegant space features breathtaking views of the deepwater marina. Enjoy an elevated dining experience in our signature venue, a perfect space to create lasting memories with friends and family.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Embracing Elegance:
Harbourview Room
For a special occasion or an intimate gathering, step into the Harbourview Room. This elegant space features breathtaking views of the deepwater marina. Enjoy an elevated dining experience in our signature venue, a perfect space to create lasting memories with friends and family.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
Mark Your Calendar
The social events at Gulf Harbour are yours to enjoy year-round, with over 300 creatively conceived and festively fun planned parties, events and celebrations. Too numerous to mention them all, gather and celebrate with friends and neighbors in everything from the Kentucky Derby Party to Take Me Back Tuesday Happy Hour, seasonal holiday dinners, to the Halloween Tennis Round Robin and the Leprechaun Golf Scramble and Dinner on St. Patrick’s Day. Throughout the year, there’s always something for everyone to enjoy with friends and family at Gulf Harbour.
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
end widget-span
end row
end row-wrapper
